SELECT o.order_to_shop, o.order_to_user, o.o_discounts, o.o_discounts_price, o.o_discounts_remark, o.o_id, o.o_service_charge, o.o_shop_ename, o.o_shop_name, o.o_state, o.o_strolley_table, o.o_subtotal, DATE_FORMAT( o.o_time, '%Y-%m-%d %k:%i:%s' ) AS o_time, DATE_FORMAT( o.o_overtime, '%Y-%m-%d %k:%i:%s' ) AS o_overtime, o.o_total FROM `db_order` o WHERE o.o_state = '1' AND TO_DAYS(NOW()) - TO_DAYS(o.o_time) = 0;

SELECT o.o_id, o.o_strolley_table, o.o_service_charge, o.o_total, o.o_time, o.order_to_shop, o.o_shop_name, o.o_shop_ename, of.of_foodid, of.of_remark, of.of_price, f.f_name, f.f_english_name FROM `db_order` o LEFT JOIN `db_order_food` of ON o.o_id = of.of_orderid LEFT JOIN `db_food` f ON f.f_id = of.of_foodid WHERE o.o_id = #{oid};

SELECT o.o_id, o.o_strolley_table, o.o_service_charge, o.o_total, o.o_time, o.order_to_shop, o.o_shop_name, o.o_shop_ename, of.of_foodid, of.of_remark, of.of_price, f.f_name, f.f_english_name FROM `db_order` o LEFT JOIN `db_order_food` of ON o.o_id = of.of_orderid LEFT JOIN `db_food` f ON f.f_id = of.of_foodid WHERE o.o_strolley_table=#{table} AND o.order_to_shop=#{sid} AND o.o_state='0';
